action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi there,


In line with the new baffle collections we're publishing on the site, can we please make the following changes to the menu navigation under the 'ceiling' category:


BAFFLES


REGULAR BAFFLES (https://acoufelt.com.au/solution/acoustic-ceiling-baffles/)


LAYERED BAFFLE (NEW) (https://acoufelt.com.au/solution/layered-ceiling-baffles/)


CLOUDS


REGULAR CLOUDS (https://acoufelt.com.au/solution/full-color-acoustic-ceiling-clouds/)


CEILING PANELS


REGULAR PANELS (https://acoufelt.com.au/solution/full-color-acoustic-ceiling-panel/)


PRINTED PANELS (https://acoufelt.com.au/solution/printed-acoustic-ceiling-panel/)


CEILING TILES


REGULAR TILES (https://acoufelt.com.au/solution/full-color-acoustic-ceiling-tiles/)


PRINTED TILES (https://acoufelt.com.au/solution/printed-ceiling-tiles/)


CEILING FRAMES


FRAMEWORK (NEW) (https://acoufelt.com.au/solution/framework-ceiling-frames/)



This will also mean creating new landing pages for 'BAFFLES', 'CLOUDS' and 'CEILING FRAMES', similar to this style: https://acoufelt.com.au/acoustic-products/wall-acoustic-solutions/acoustic-planks-and-tiles/




Thanks!






Warm regards,
Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager
T: +61 1800 626 462 • M: +61 414 167 790
Level 43, 264 George Street, Sydney, NSW, 2000
acoufelt.com
